Aphari IT Multi-Sourcing Information Assurance and Security Capability Set-up

Aphari helps organisations transform their IT operating model, adopt cloud services, implement multi source delivery models, establish systems integration and service integration (SIAM) capabilities. Our Information Assurance and Security Capability Setup service helps clients adapt their information assurance, security architecture and security risk management approach to support the multi-source transformation.

Features

  • Defines Information Assurance and risk management approach for multi-supplier environment.
  • Framework enables end to end management of Information Security risks.
  • Defines the Information Security obligations of each supplier.
  • Helps determine security controls to be delivered by different suppliers.
  • Establishes common approach to risk management and accreditation across suppliers.
  • Holistic approach across security and interrelated functions.
  • Integrates security activities with the operating model and delivery lifecycle.
  • Approach based on pragmatic application of public-domain best practices.
  • Framework includes MSP, PRINCE, COBIT, TOGAF, HMG Security Policy, ITIL.
  • Can combine with other Aphari services including Set-up, Accelerators etc.

Benefits

  • Helps organisations transform their IT operating model and supply chain.
  • Helps clients build in-house capability needed to manage multi-supplier delivery.
  • Mitigates specific information risk management challenges arising from multi-vendor models.
  • Provides approach for maintaining information security compliance throughout the transformation.
  • Minimises overheads of managing security compliance activities in large programmes.
  • Highlights cross-functional inter relationships and lays foundations for structured collaboration.
  • Helps minimise delay costs arising from unforseen information security risks.
  • No lock-in to proprietary or 'branded' methodologies.
  • Our holistic approach speaks to stakeholders in their own language.
  • Aphari services based on extensive public sector Information Assurance experience.
